reviewText: After taking hundreds of lessons and attending 5 different golf schools, I've learned more from this video in less than an hour. It's simple and the lessons learned help me create the effortless power I had before I got screwed up by taking traditional golf lessons. At age 70, I've been reborn.
It's to arm oriented for me, most already hit with the arms
I'm a senior and who doesn't want to hit 300 yards! You will be hearing from me if it works!

Very good clear, well presented, excellent graphics, guidance for senior golfers, plus extremely helpful individual follow up support to complementary DVD also available separately, at a most reasonable price. Unbeatable value!
interesting idea which uses  a rotational movement  to generate power into the impact zone
